item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Help the poor children

Help for hopeless.

Fight for right cause for save the world. Every child deserves a better future!

Explore causes

We're a charitable group that improves lives

Child assistance

Education is the first to independence child.

Disaster relief

Charitable group focus on disaster work.

Animal welfare

We are protects animals across the globe.

Health care

Health care are essential for a child's growth.

Total raising money in this year > $4,50,000

Popular causes

Currently have 102 project partners across in world that work on child issues.
  • Post Thumbnail Education Education for children

    Lorem ipsum dolor consectetur adipiscing eiusmod tempor.

    73% Goal: $30,000 Raised: $22,010 Explore more
  • Post Thumbnail Support Build a secure happy life

    Lorem ipsum dolor consectetur adipiscing eiusmod tempor.

    90% Goal: $50,000 Raised: $45,010 Explore more
  • Post Thumbnail Childhood Save childhood africa

    Lorem ipsum dolor consectetur adipiscing eiusmod tempor.

    50% Goal: $50,000 Raised: $25,000 Explore more
All our efforts are made possible only because of your support. See all causes

How organization works

01 Join our website

02 Start your campagins

03 Share with friends

04 Manage donations

Fight for right cause for save the world. Donate now

Achievements

Received many awards in recognition of our work towards enabling better futures. Social media brand of the year Best campaign in communication Worlds most trusted organization Recognition We are thankful for their faith in our services by giving us such an honour.

Why volunteer with foundation?

Your volunteering experience will help you develop invaluable professional skills and build your leadership capabilities.

Become a volunteer 2K Volunteers

Success stories

Positive stories of change that will make your day, you've come to the right place! Read More Health We providing urgent aid after cyclone. item.title: Aboutcharity
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
We're a charitable group that better improves lives.

The organizations programs are focused on direct interventions in the areas of healthcare, agecare, livelihoods, disaster response as well as advocacy and awareness on rights. Leading charity platform in world.

Programs are focused on direct interventions in the areas.

Charity programs

Currently have 102 project partners across in world that work on child issues. All our efforts are made possible only because of your support. See all causes Fight for right

We served more then 80,000 poor peoples.

The organizations programs are focused on direct interventions in the areas of healthcare, livelihoods, disaster response as well as advocacy.

Funding 80% Donations 87% Humanity 93%

We help them to have a better life than yesterday.

Video Play Button Let's make something great work together. Get involved NOW!
Understand elder needs

21% of the elderly are still working & earning.

Funded 2000+ projects

Currently have 2050 project across in world.

Achievements

Received many awards in recognition of our work towards enabling better futures. Social media brand of the year Best campaign in communication Worlds most trusted organization Recognition We are thankful for their faith in our services by giving us such an honour.

item.title: Volunteer

item.content:encoded:
Volunteer leader and founder

We are a nonprofit fighting poverty.

We will help you with the choice of fund Crafto engages organizations, corporates and individuals from India and globally as partners and supporters. Donor satisfaction is guaranteed Crafto engages organizations, corporates and individuals from India and globally as partners and supporters. We will help you with the choice of fund Crafto engages organizations, corporates and individuals from India and globally as partners and supporters.

Core volunteers

Your volunteering experience will help you develop invaluable professional.

item.title: Contact us
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Keep in touch with us

Looking for help? Ready to help!

Feel free to get in touch?

123 456 7890

How can we help you?

help@yourdomain.com

Are you ready for volunteer?
